data.name: Afterlife
data.detailed_description:
Afterlife is a challenging side-scrolling adventure game. Filled with tight platformer obstacles, you must unravel the mysteries of this strange land by finding clues, solving puzzles, and dying, over and over again. Made by PracticalNPC




Key features:
- discover challenging secrets
- a melancholic story without the use of any dialogue (I'm a programmer, not a story writer :D)
- satisfying, responsive controls
- cats
data.about_the_game:
Afterlife is a challenging side-scrolling adventure game. Filled with tight platformer obstacles, you must unravel the mysteries of this strange land by finding clues, solving puzzles, and dying, over and over again. Made by PracticalNPC




Key features:
- discover challenging secrets
- a melancholic story without the use of any dialogue (I'm a programmer, not a story writer :D)
- satisfying, responsive controls
- cats
data.short_description: Afterlife is a challenging side-scrolling adventure game. Filled with tight platformer mechanics and obstacles, you must unravel the mysteries of this strange land by finding clues, solving puzzles, and dying, over and over again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service pack 1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4210 1.7ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard soundcard or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard sound card
